description: This file defines an asynchronous function to run an AI agent with event-driven output, utilizing imported classes and methods related to agent execution and event handling. It sets up an agent with a specific model and runs it with a detailed prompt, printing various events and content as they occur.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and reasoning capabilities.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model configuration.

classes.name: RunEvent
classes.description: Enumeration of different event types emitted during agent execution.

methods.name: run_agent_with_events
methods.description: Asynchronous function that runs the agent with a given prompt, printing event updates and reasoning content.
